text: Cea midi hen hrux wa thæ cring xallxh theanan phu thi xyu nı chan fa thanghlay læa phu thi xyu nı phændin læa dwng xathity læa dwng canthr læa dwngdaw thanghlay læa phukhea thanghlay læa tnmi læa satw thanghlay læa swn mak khxng mnusʹy tang k suyu d nxbnxm tx phraxngkh tæ swn mak kar lngthosʹ ca hemaasm khukhwr kæ khea læa phu dı thi xallxh thrng thahı xapys k ca mimi phu dı hı keiyrti khea thæcring xallxh nan thrng kratha sing thi phraxngkh thrng sngkh
